MESSAGE: My name is Damian. On this website, you can learn about me! Hover over the buttons on the left to see more info, click the button on the top-right to visit my website, or click the button on the bottom-right to visit my linktree page!
Damian isn't 100% sure about this one.
Gaming (mostly Minecraft and Roblox), YouTube (making and watching), most candy (especially candy corn), making projects (websites and stuff), animals (especially cats), etc.
talking to people, public speaking, homophobia (go tf away), transphobia (also go away), etc.
streaming games on Twitch (mostly Minecraft lol), making YouTube commentary videos, making YouTube shorts, making Minecraft addons, making websites, making scratch games, etc.
I have autism, I might need clarification on the tone of certain messages, I have pretty bad social anxiety and anxiety in general, etc.
